00051 #import <UIKit/UIKit.h>
00052 
00053 /*
00054  The KeychainItemWrapper class is an abstraction layer for the iPhone Keychain communication. It is merely a 
00055  simple wrapper to provide a distinct barrier between all the idiosyncracies involved with the Keychain
00056  CF/NS container objects.
00057  */
00058 @interface KeychainItemWrapper : NSObject
00059 {
00060     NSMutableDictionary *keychainItemData;              // The actual keychain item data backing store.
00061     NSMutableDictionary *genericPasswordQuery;  // A placeholder for the generic keychain item query used to locate the item.
00062 }
00063 
00064 @property (nonatomic, retain) NSMutableDictionary *keychainItemData;
00065 @property (nonatomic, retain) NSMutableDictionary *genericPasswordQuery;
00066 
00067 // Designated initializer.
00068 - (id)initWithIdentifier: (NSString *)identifier accessGroup:(NSString *) accessGroup;
00069 - (void)setObject:(id)inObject forKey:(id)key;
00070 - (id)objectForKey:(id)key;
00071 
00072 // Initializes and resets the default generic keychain item data.
00073 - (void)resetKeychainItem;
00074 
00075 @end
